actions.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 223 (Roll no. 155).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 223 (Roll no. 155).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. DeFazio.

description: An amendment numbered 42 printed in Part A of House Report 115-650 to repeal a prohibition on U.S. regulation of air transportation of flammable lithium batteries unless there has been an accident. The amendment restores the DOT's authority to regulate lithium batteries beyond international baselines, without waiting for an accident to occur.
purpose: Amendment sought to repeal a prohibition on U.S. regulation of air transportation of flammable lithium batteries unless there has been an accident. Also, the amendment sought to restore the DOT's authority to regulate lithium batteries beyond international baselines, without waiting for an accident to occur.
